hero.title: 52 weeks,
hero.subtitle: A personal challenge to create 52 micro-projects in 52 weeks

weekProgress.title: Weekly Progress
weekProgress.subtitle: Follow the development of projects week by week

suggest.title: Suggest a Project
suggest.subtitle: Have an innovative idea that can be built in a week?

form.title: Idea Title
form.placeholder_problem: Describe a need or difficulty that people/companies face and would pay to solve.
form.placeholder_innovation: Explain what makes your solution unique compared to existing alternatives in the market
form.accept: By submitting, you agree that your idea may be implemented during the TUGO52 challenge and made available as open source.

examples.title: Examples of good suggestions:
examples.text-ex1: A service that generates unique avatars based on usernames or hashes.
examples.text-ex2: A specialized assistant that creates personalized wedding speeches using AI
examples.text-ex3: A system that generates and customizes legal documents using AI, focusing on common needs of small businesses and professionals.

lookingFor.title: What we are looking for:
lookingFor.text1: Innovation solutions that solve real problems
lookingFor.text3: MVP's that can be build in one week

about.title: About TUGO52
about.subtitle: A 52-week journey turning ideas into code

manifest.text: TUGO52 is a personal challenge turned into a movement: creating 52 projects in 52 weeks. Each project is an opportunity to learn, experiment, and contribute to the developer community.
manifest.text2: 'The best way to learn is by building. The best way to grow is by sharing. This project brings both together.'

pillars.title: Project Pillars
pillars.text_global: Creating solutions that can be useful for developers anywhere in the world.
pillars.text_learning: Exploring new technologies and concepts with each project, expanding technical horizons.
pillars.text_opensource: All code is open source, allowing others to learn, contribute, and be inspired.
pillars.text_mvp: Focused on delivering value quickly, with functional MVPs in one week.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.answer1: A full year of focused development, creating a consistent routine of building and learning.
faq.answer2: A combination of community suggestions, identified needs, and experimentation with new technologies.
faq.answer3: Absolutely! You can suggest projects, contribute code, or provide feedback on implementations.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Let's talk about technology, projects, and innovation
